summary: This mod replaces the ugly black painted Solstheim road with a nice new one.
descriptionHtml:
[b] [size=15]What does this mod do?[/size] [/b]

[size=5]This mod [b]replaces the ugly black painted Solstheim road with a nice new one.[/b][/size]



[u][size=8]Introduction:[/size][/u]
[size=4]
Maybe a dusty ash desert isn´t supposed to have a proper road. But black paint...?
Government-approved master builder Dani (Gruberix) had to step in and fix that.
I wasn´t able to remove the black paint so I decided to build over it...
The new road connects Raven Rock and Brodir Grove.

You can try out [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52886/?]More Ash on the Road[/url] if you would like to have ... more ash on the road :)[/size]


[u][size=8]Requirements:[/size][/u]
[size=4]The Dragonborn DLC is required, as my mod changes the Solstheim area.
Also the Dawnguard DLC is needed for a reason I don´t know.[/size]


[u][size=8]Compatibility:[/size][/u]
[size=4]I deleted some objects on the road and placed new road fragments.
Also terraformed the area a bit. So any mod that doesn´t touch roads should be ok.[/size]
author: Dani - Gruberix
